attributes.action: Make social media sign up require I.D, and have stronger age limits
attributes.additional_details: There is to many people setting up fake account on all social media from Facebook, twitter, Instagram, tiktok and it need to stop, to many people have lost their lives and enough is enough, people shouldn't be able to hide behind fake account, if calling some a n***** or f***** and t**** is a hate crime in public then it should be online and we should make it easier for the police to find these people, it would also help track down pedophiles on these apps and it'll all be link to their ID
attributes.background: I want the government to make social media sites required ID to sign up, so people can be held accountable for what they say online to stop trolling, and make age requirements stricter, like 15+ and untill 18 it has to be link to a parents account, so if they do troll they can be found

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make verified ID a requirement for opening a social media account: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575833

Minimum age 16 for all social media apps and platforms: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550542
